name: SynchroCity
description:
Guide Robotic Autonomous Courier unit HEL through the districts and streets of SynchroCity as you attempt to solve puzzles, avoid deadly traps, and - ultimately - complete your quest to find out what has given you the power to move and think freely!

SynchroCity follows the gameplay style of classic retro titles such as Dizzy and Back To Skool where you must find items and solve puzzles to gain access to the depths of SynchroCity and fulfil your goal. 

SynchroCity is currently in active development with an estimated release date in October 2023. If you want to watch the game grow until it's release you can follow it's progress on our Discord server:

https://discord.gg/pxzHq99NPd
